name: Solar System 2
description:
This model of the solar system has planets orbiting around the sun in their respective orbits. All the planets also have their own normal and height maps to look more realistic. 

Two different cameras have been used to showcase the ability of camera selectors. Click on the screen and then press 1 and 2 to switch between the cameras. The second camera shows you the view of the Earth from the Moon during its orbital journey. Enjoy!
